00104 namespace hdstl{
00105 namespace concepts{
00118    template <class HDS> 
00119    struct ForwardHDSConcept {
00121 
00125       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00126       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::traversal_category traversal_category;
00127       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::forward_category forward_category;
00129 
00133       void constraints() {
00134          using namespace boost;
00135 
00136          function_requires<HDSConcept<HDS> >();
00137          function_requires<ConvertibleConcept<traversal_category,
00138                                                     forward_traversal_tag> >();  
00139          const bool is_valid_storage_tag =
00140             is_convertible<forward_category,next_at_source_tag>::value ||
00141             is_convertible<forward_category,next_at_target_tag>::value ||
00142             is_convertible<forward_category,next_in_facet_tag>::value;
00143          BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( is_valid_storage_tag ); 
00144          // Error message could be improved
00145 
00146          h = next_in_facet(hds,h);
00147          h = next_at_source(hds,h);
00148          h = next_at_target(hds,h);
00149          const_constraints(hds);
00150       }
00154       void const_constraints(HDS const& hds){
00155          h = next_in_facet(hds,h);
00156          h = next_at_source(hds,h);
00157          h = next_at_target(hds,h);
00158       }
00159       
00160       ForwardHDS hds;
00161       halfedge_descriptor h;
00162       halfedge_descriptor g;
00163    };
00164 }  // close namespace concepts
00165 }  // close namespace hdstl

00167 #endif
